degrees.name: B.Tech. in Information and Communication Technology
descriptions: Coordinator of iDecipher, iFest-2015 and iFest-2016, IEEE Technical Festival
Core Member of Hostel Management Committee (2015-16) and Active Member of Anti-raging Committee (2017-18)
Coursework: Programming and Software Development(C, JAVA, Python); Computer Networking; Theoretical Computations; DBMS;Software Engineering(Agile and Waterflow methods), SEO

responsabilities: Creating new billing software for one of the oldest telecom company in North America.
As part of frontend dev team, I am working on creating reusable Vue components, adding dynamic data to them and using them in multiple places in the application.
Making sure design of the webapp replicate modern design standards and provide excellent user experience
As COVID-19 was on peak and main street business were shutting down, we were helping them to go online and build a digital business to thrive.
I was supporting businesses by creating and managing online stores, websites, and creating online courses.
Created a platform for schools, specifically for teachers, who has a lot of burden rather than just teaching.
It provided functionality from marking attendance to sending grades to parents.
Reformed their APIs and helped to migrate from python 2 to python 3.
I have always been a person of contact for them whenever their server was malfunctioning.
Worked on a part of algorithm that is going to suggest best combination of clothes from their inventory.

projectsInfo.name: Better Drive
projectsInfo.description: Better Drive is a free tool to analyze your Google Drive account. Google Drive is a powerful file storage and synchronization service, but sometimes you feel like you lose control of it. Keeping privacy concerns in mind, that many users have, we built this great tool to help you organize, clean, and leverage the use of your Google Drive.
